roleset.name: to block
roleset.note: OBSTRUCT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'obstruct' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from obstruct.01-v predicate notes)
OBSTRUCTION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on obstruct-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls forbid-67. (from obstruction.01-n)
OBSTRUCTED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from obstructed.01-j)
OBSTRUCTING-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from obstructing.01-j)

example.name: transitive
example.text: The 8 ft. hedges which [*T*-1] obstruct views in and out of small ` rooms ' insure ... that this garden will be a potential breeding ground for crime . ''
example.arg: views in and out of small ` rooms '

example.name: just arg1
example.text: They were charged with racketeering , conspiracy , obstruction of justice and mail fraud in a scheme in which they allegedly embezzled more than $100 million from their homeland .

example.name: both args
example.text: Officer Black warned them they would be arrested if they did not cease their obstruction of the pathway
